EDB Postgres Advanced Server adds extended functionality to the open-source PostgreSQL database. The extended functionality supports database administration, enhanced SQL capabilities, database and application security, performance monitoring and analysis, and application development utilities.

For information about the features that are shared by EDB Postgres Advanced Server and PostgreSQL, see the [PostgreSQL core documentation](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/index.html).
